faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle1: How do I contact customer support if I have a question or issue
faq.description1: You can reach our customer support team by emailing:
faq.subtitle2: What makes your product stand out from others in the market?
faq.description2: Our product distinguishes itself through its adaptability, durability, and innovative features. We prioritize user satisfaction and continually strive to exceed expectations in every aspect
faq.description3: You are helping us already by just trying out our projects and recommending it. Otherwise you can subscribe to our youtube channel and engage with the community. For additional support you also donate us directly through PayPal

feature-page.title: Features
feature-page.subheader: We are dedicated to creating high-quality digital experiences that are accessible, versatile, and shaped by our community. Here's how we approach our projects.

items.title: Seamless Across Devices
items.description: Your experience shouldn't be tied to one screen. Our projects are meticulously optimized to run smoothly on any device—from desktops and laptops to tablets and mobile phones, both old and new.

items.title: Creativity Without Cost
items.description: We believe great software and entertainment should be available to everyone. Most of our projects are completely free, with premium software offered at a minimal, fair price.

items.title: Community-Powered Support
items.description: We're not just developers; we're part of the community. We thrive on your feedback and provide direct, responsive support to ensure our projects evolve with your needs.

article.title: New Project announcement
article.description: We announce that our new project will be a free to play desktop video game that will be available on all operating systems and platforms
article.author: Michael Schenk, Developer

article.title: TouchSlider is live
article.description: We announce that that our mobile video game TouchSlider is avaible for IOS And Android to download for free
article.author: Michael Schenk, Developer

article.author: Michael Schenk, Developer

principles-page.title: Our principles
principles-page.subheader: These values are at the heart of everything we build, from the first line of code to the final user experience

items.title: Accessible Everywhere
items.description: We believe great software should work for everyone, on any device. Our projects are meticulously engineered for cross-platform compatibility and accessibility from the ground up

items.title: Polished & Performant
items.description: We deliver complete and highly optimized experiences. Our focus on clean architecture and rigorous testing ensures every product is stable, performant, and ready to enjoy from day one

items.title: Intuitive Desing
items.description: We believe powerful software doesn't have to be complicated. Our passion lies in crafting clean, intuitive interfaces that make every interaction straightforward and enjoyable

items.title: Powered by Innovation
items.description: We build with the future in mind. By leveraging the latest in software and hardware technology, we create forward-thinking products with powerful, cutting-edge functionality

items.title: Dedicated Support
items.description: Our relationship doesn't end at the download. We provide friendly, responsive support directly from our team to ensure you have a great experience with our products, always

items.title: Meticulous Craftsmanship
items.description: We believe excellence lies in the details. From the first concept to the final line of code, every element of our work is thoughtfully planned and precisely executed for a flawless final product

testimonials-page.title: Testimonials
testimonials-page.subheader: See what our customers, developers and testers love about our products

testimonial.name: Nil Akash
testimonial.testimonial: Nice game, everyone can enjoy and play this!

testimonial.name: Joy Roy
testimonial.testimonial: This game is absolutelz perfect for playing while travleing or during leisure time

testimonial.name: Anita Roy
testimonial.testimonial: Fun and fast-paced! The tapo-to-turn mechanic is genius. Love trying to beat my previous high score

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: I absolutely love how versatile this product is! Whether I'm tackling work projects or indulging in my favorite hobbies, it seamlessly adapts to my changing needs. Its intuitive design has truly enhanced my daily routine, making tasks more efficient and enjoyable

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: One of the standout features of this product is the exceptional customer support. In my experience, the team behind this product has been quick to respond and incredibly helpful. It's reassuring to know that they stand firmly behind their product

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: The level of simplicity and user-friendliness in this product has significantly simplified my life. I appreciate the creators for delivering a solution that not only meets but exceeds user expectations
